general.heroDescriptionIntegrations: Shopware offers a powerful API for perfectly integrating third-party systems into your processes. In order to establish proper means of communication between those, Shopware requires external applications to authenticate through individual security keys. You can create these keys right here. This enables you to separately track changes, introduced e.g. by external applications.

detail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this integration?
detail.secretHelpText: After you hit save, the access key will no longer be visible. Be sure to copy and store the key in a secure place before you proceed. In case you have lost the key anyway, you will have to come back here and generate a completely new key.
